work.name: Compile Oy
highlights: Developed and maintained HR-software for customer, working with .NET technologies
Improved codebase for readability and ease of implementing new features
Created internal tools for consultant project visualization, using React and GraphQL

work.name: Digia Plc
highlights: Java
Docker
Implemented CI/CD tools for testing, versioning, and deployment, enhancing team productivity
Increased team efficiency by getting rid of the heavy local environments that used virtual machines
work.summary: Worked in a scrum team, with main focus on improving work of other teams by implementing automation solutions and improving other slow development practices.

work.name: Elisa Automate
highlights: Kotlin
React
Developed frontend and backend for network operation center automations, reducing manual work and increasing efficiency
work.summary: Worked as a part of international scrum team, focusing on providing automation solutions for foreign teleoperators.

work.name: Digia Plc
highlights: Led version control and CI/CD tool migration
Developed REST API's for member registry software
Implemented end-to-end tests for improved quality assurance
work.summary: Backend focused role, with a DevOps twist. Helped migrate version control from SVN to Git, and CI/CD from Bamboo to GitLab CI/CD. Wrote documentation and guides to ensure successful onboarding for multiple teams, with little downtime.

work.name: Hintaseuranta
highlights: Implemented web scrapers to fetch customer pricing data for comparison, enabling users to find the best prices for products
Developed rules for automatic product categorization, to reduce manual labor
work.summary: Solo developer role, with freedom to choose how to approach challenges on my own. Type of work depended on if the actual customer had provided product data, or if we actually had to use scraping to get it ourselves.

work.name: Tilastokeskus - Statistics Finland
highlights: Data
.NET Framework
Streamlined data receiving pipelines with various microservices to handle new loads efficiently
Redesigned and implemented geolocation database with experts
work.summary: Worked in various internal projects, to help statistics units with their work. Developer work mostly alone, but scrum teams included specialists and architects who gave requirements for work.

work.name: Arter Oy (IMS Business Solutions)
highlights: Java
React
Developed and maintained ERP-software
Fixed various bottlenecks affecting customers with high amounts of users and data, improving performance by a huge margin
work.summary: Worked as a full stack developer in an inhouse software team. Worked closely with technical support to troubleshoot and resolve customer issues promptly, ensuring high satisfaction levels

work.name: Luottokunta (Nets)
highlights: Created a wallboard solution to gather data from various systems and display them in an easily readable fashion
Enhanced testing tools for payment terminal team, making it possible to record actual payment transactions and run them again without manual work
Developed internal solutions to streamline processes and enhance team performance
work.summary: Hired from school to work in a payment terminal scrum team. My goal was to take on tasks that would highly benefit the team, but the team itself did not have the time for.

education.studyType: Vocational Qualification in Business Information Technology
